body:
Hi, I got my harbor cluster with no clair installed, however noticed image scanning occurs at 00:00 UTC (08:00 CHT)every day, my harbor version is **v1.2.2**, which is a little old but satisfies our needs well.  Got the event's from ui log as below:

```
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [INFO] Receive evaluation signal from policy 'Alternate Policy'
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [INFO] Policies:1, Tasks:221, CompletedTasks:220, FailedTasks:0
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [INFO] Scanning all images on Harbor.
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [INFO] Policies:1, Tasks:221, CompletedTasks:221, FailedTasks:0
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [tokenauthorizer.go:197]: scopses parsed from request: repository:apollo-config-system/apollo-dev:pull
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [transport.go:50]: 200 | GET http://registry:5000/v2/apollo-config-system/apollo-dev/tags/list
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [security.go:133]: got secret from request

Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [security.go:138]: creating a secret security context...
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [token.go:35]: URL for token request: /service/token?scope=repository%3Aapollo-config-system%2Fapollo-dev%3Apull&service=harbor-registry
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [creator.go:200]: scopes: [repository:apollo-config-system/apollo-dev:pull]
Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [authutils.go:47]: scopes: [repository:apollo-config-system/apollo-dev:pull]

Jul 10 08:00:14 172.19.0.1 docker/ui[105205]: 2018-07-10T00:00:14Z [DEBUG] [security.go:283]: user information is nil
```

Got no clue if those are expected behaviors, can someone help me to confirm? Thanks in advance。
title: Harbor scans all images although no Clair installed along with.
